title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may often play the strong and silent type, rarely gushing over your feelings unless its warranted. Instead, you bring mature focus to emotions and a responsible brand of purpose to your helpfulness. Your pragmatic approach puts you in the catbird seat when it comes to showing another person that you care today. Drive the carpool, buy the coffee, or field a tough phone call on their behalf. There are countless practical ways to express what is in your heart. Your authenticity speaks volumes when your actions are on point. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
